findings.title: Multiple Version
findings.description: Presence of multiple compiler version across all contracts

findings.title: Incorrect Access Control
findings.description: Owner cannot renounce and transfer ownership, Owner cannot burn tokens, Owner cannot mint after initial deployment, Owner cannot set max transaction limit, Owner cannot block users, Owner cannot pause contract

findings.title: Payable Contract
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Custom Modifier
findings.description: major recheck for custom modifier logic

findings.title: Divide Before Multiply
findings.description: Performing multiplication before division is generally better to avoid loss of precision

findings.title: Multiple Calls
findings.description: Functions with multiple internal calls

findings.title: Deprecated Keywords
findings.description: Use of deprecated functions/operators such as block.blockhash() for blockhash(), msg.gas for gasleft(), throw for revert(), sha3() for keccak256(), callcode() for delegatecall(), suicide() for selfdestruct(), constant for view or var for actual type name should be avoided to prevent unintended errors with newer compiler versions

findings.title: Unused Contract
findings.description: Presence of an unused, unimported or uncalled contract

findings.title: Assembly Usage
findings.description: Use of EVM assembly is error-prone and should be avoided or double-checked for correctness

findings.title: Similar Variable Names
findings.description: Variables with similar names could be confused for each other and therefore should be avoided

findings.title: Commented Code
findings.description: Removal of commented/unused code lines

findings.title: Insufficient Gas Griefing
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to gas griefing attacks due to insufficient gas handling.

findings.title: Arbitrary Jump with Function Type Variable
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: DoS With Block Gas Limit
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Typographical Error
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Right-To-Left-Override control character(U+202E)
findings.description: The presence of Right-To-Left-Override control character (U+202E) may lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the contract.

findings.title: Unexpected Ether balance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Hash Collisions With Multiple Variable Arguments
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Message call with hardcoded gas amount
findings.description: Hardcoded gas amounts can lead to unexpected behavior and potentially cause a DoS attack.

findings.title: Code With No Effects
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unencrypted Private Data On-Chain
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting Solidity v0.8+. The compiler now has Built in overflow checking.
